Name: Plant Revenge
About the game: Imagine a world where plants take revenge. You are this plant! Take revenge for what scientists made with your girlfriend. - Collect potions - Unlock six different characters - Play the story in 90 levels - Play 45 bonus levels - Fight against 20+ different enemys - Get Steam achivements
